title: 3D Movie Collection Enhanced  (IMAX 3D + Creeps 3D) - Field Sequ
description:
IMAX 3D/Horror 3D Movie Collection 
----------------------------------

Real field sequential 3D movies - Can be played with StereoPlayer by Peter Wimmer http://www.3dtv.at/Index_en.aspx  and output to various 3D formats eg anaglyph (red/cyan glasses), shutter-glasses etc...

All movies have been encoded using XVID. The formats have not been altered (Sadly, they all come in 4:3 on DVD which is a shame since they&#039;re originally in IMAX format.) Some movies had pretty bad quality out of the box.


ENHANCED VERSION: Better encoding, less artifacts, smaller file sizes.



Here we go:

IMAX 3D Collection
-----------------------------

1) Encounter in the Third Dimension
Known from IMAX - 36:01

2) Haunted Castle
As shown in IMAX - 36:42

3) SOS Planet
Horrible boring production, but has one or two nice 3D scenes. 36:05

4) Alien Adventure
As shown in IMAX - 33:41

Other 3D Movies
------------------------

1) The Creeps 3D 
Some horror flick. 01:16:04



HOW TO PLAY:
------------

In StereoPlayer select and load the movie to play. Select "interlaced L/R" source if asked.

Select desired 3D viewing output method in menu.

If the 3D effect does not look right swap left/right 3D view with key F7 to correct 3D view.




Have Fun!
